original_text: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
korean_text: 여러분은 자기를 위하여 또는 온 양 떼를 위하여 삼가라 성령이 그들 가운데 여러분을 감독자로 삼고 하나님이 자기 피로 사신 교회를 보살피게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers
sentences.korean_translation: 성령께서 너희를 감독자로 삼으신 그 곳에서

sentences.original_text: to care for the church of God
which he obtained with his own blood.
